Footer.tagline: Punti Furbi - Your eSIM comparison tool for smart travel
Footer.disclosureText: Instead of ad banners and paywalls, we earn through affiliate links to various eSIM service providers featured on the site. While we do our best to explore the market to find the best offers, we cannot consider every possible product available to you. Our wide range of trusted affiliate partners allows us to provide detailed, impartial, solution-oriented recommendations for every type of consumer question and problem. This lets us match our users with the most suitable providers and, in turn, match our providers with new customers, creating a win-win for all parties. However, although some of our links may earn us a commission, this never affects the independence and integrity of our opinions, recommendations, and ratings.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.whatIsESimAnswer: An eSIM is a digital SIM embedded in your device that lets you activate data plans without a physical SIM.
faq.howToActivate: How do I activate an eSIM?
faq.howToActivateAnswer: Download the provider's app, scan the QR code, and follow the instructions. Activation takes just a few minutes.
faq.deviceCompatibilityAnswer: Most modern smartphones support eSIM. Check your device specs to be sure.

questions.a: An eSIM is a digital SIM integrated into your device: you can activate data plans without a physical SIM.

questions.q: How do I activate an eSIM?
questions.a: Download the provider app, scan the QR code, and follow the instructions. It takes just a few minutes.
Most recent smartphones support eSIM. Check the specifications to be sure.

whyUse.title: Why use an eSIM?
whyUse.description: eSIMs offer a completely digital solution for mobile connectivity, more practical and convenient than traditional SIMs. With eSIM data plans you can stay connected without interruption during your travels, using other devices like tablets and laptops immediately after activation. Unlimited data plans allow you to browse freely, while data connection remains stable thanks to local provider networks.

noPhysicalSim.title: No physical SIM
noPhysicalSim.description: No more SIM cards to manage. eSIMs are integrated into the device and activate digitally. They can be activated in 24 hours with proper use of the QR code, eliminating the need for a physical SIM card.

globalCoverage.title: Global coverage
globalCoverage.description: Works in over 190 countries with a single eSIM. Perfect for frequent travelers. After activating the eSIM, coverage may vary by country, but always guarantees a stable data connection through local networks.

instantActivation.title: Instant activation
instantActivation.description: Connected in seconds. Just scan a QR code to activate your eSIM.

advancedSecurity.title: Advanced security
advancedSecurity.description: Impossible to steal physically. eSIMs are protected by advanced encryption.

onlinePurchase.title: Online purchase
onlinePurchase.description: No more queues in stores. Buy online and get your eSIM instantly by email.

multiSimSupport.title: Multi-SIM support
multiSimSupport.description: Multiple numbers on one device. Keep your main SIM and add eSIMs for travel.

deviceCompatibility.title: eSIM Device Compatibility
deviceCompatibility.subtitle: Find out if your device supports eSIM and how to configure it. Complete guide for iPhone, Samsung, Pixel and smartwatch.

checks.0: Verify the device was purchased after 2018
checks.3: Make sure the software is updated

howToCheck.iphoneTest:
iPhone:

howToCheck.smartwatchTest:
Smartwatch:

Check if it's the Cellular/LTE model

howItWorks.title: What is an eSIM? How does it really work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Discover everything you need to know about eSIMs and compare with traditional SIMs

whatIsEsim.title: What is an eSIM?
whatIsEsim.description: An eSIM (embedded SIM) is a virtual SIM integrated into the device that allows you to activate data plans without having to physically insert a SIM card.

howEsimWorks.title: How do eSIMs work?
howEsimWorks.description: Activation is simple and fast: you buy the eSIM online, receive a QR code or activation link, and the eSIM activates automatically.

advantages.title: Advantages ✅
advantages.0: No physical SIM card to manage

disadvantages.title: Disadvantages ❌
disadvantages.1: Difficult to transfer to another device

disadvantages.title: Disadvantages ❌
disadvantages.0: Physical card to manage and not lose

whichToChoose.title: Which to choose?
whichToChoose.description: eSIMs are the best choice for modern travelers thanks to their practicality, security and convenience. However, make sure your device supports eSIMs before buying one.
